name: PanComOS
description:
Welcome to PanCom OS,

The world's first spam filtering operating system.

Your job is to inspect e-Mails and judge if they're allowed to be sent out.

Earn money to customize your desktop with themes, cursors, and backgrounds!

Invade people's privacy in the name of safety!

Have fun and good luck!

Made by:  Hyohnoo

Music & sound design by:  Viktor Kraus
